summary: This code defines two functions, `k` and `k0`, which read and write files respectively. It then uses these functions to append contents of "bitch.py" and "standardInsult.py", and adds a line to print the output of a function named "monad" with its first argument as the file content and second argument as the global variables.

details.comment: This code defines two functions, `k` and `k0`, which read and write files respectively. It then uses these functions to append contents of "bitch.py" and "standardInsult.py", and adds a line to print the output of a function named "monad" with its first argument as the file content and second argument as the global variables.
